name: Color Trick - Brain Challenges
description:
Do you like to trick your brain?

This game will test your reflexes and mind skills.

The game show the name of one color, but with another font color. Can you select the right color before the time expires?

Improve your reflexes and your mind skills playing 5 minutes per day. You will notice the your improvement!

There are 3 different difficulty modes, so you can either choose "Easy" to just play and relax,
or "Insane" to test your skills at the maximum. Spoiler alert: this mode is really insane!

Choose a language among the 7 available to perform better.
